Description: Thank you for visiting our ebay store! This classic and elegant gold-tone exhibition pocket watch from Gotham is the perfect addition to anyone's timepiece collection. Features include a precision 17 jewel mechanical movement showcased in full view when the front and back case covers are opened showing all moving parts, brushed satin gold-tone case and scratch resistant mineral crystals to protect your timepiece. In addition, this double cover skeleton pocket watch includes a deluxe 15 inch steel curb chain that can attach to your belt loop. As always, your watch will arrive beautifully gift packaged and include operating instructions, lifetime limited warranty and a Selvyt polishing cloth to keep your watch clean. This is truly a beautiful watch at a great price. Enjoy. - Classic round gold-tone 17 jewel mechanical double cover pocket watch suitable for engraving - Intricately designed front and back covers that both open to expose movement - Scratch resistant front and back mineral crystals - Includes 15" steel curb pocket watch chain with deluxe lobster claw end piece - Arrives in beautiful presentation box with Selvyt polishing cloth, lifetime limited warranty and operating instructions Gotham Men's Gold-Tone Double Cover Exhibition Mechanical Pocket Watch #
